about_the_game:
When Jason’s dad leaves him home alone to go on a business trip, sinister things start happening in the usually quiet ‘Devil’s Drive’. Can you survive playing as young Jason while uncovering the secrets of Devil’s Drive?

The Nightmare Chronicles - Devil's Drive is the second episodic psychological horror game in The Nightmare Chronicles franchise, plunging players into a suspenseful tale of supernatural dread and psychological terror. Experience a very ordinary suburban street transformed into a nightmare where nothing is as it seems.

The Nightmare Chronicles: Devil's Drive continues the tradition of spine-chilling psychological horror that The Nightmare Chronicles is known for. Step into the shoes of Jason and experience a haunted journey filled with supernatural phenomena, eerie atmospheres, and the mind-bending search for escaping the grip of Devil's Drive.

Devil's Drive offers a first-person survival horror experience where you explore a haunted suburban neighborhood, engage in dynamic conversations, solve intricate puzzles, and evade supernatural threats using stealth and strategy. Your choices shape the narrative, leading to multiple endings, all while immersive soundscapes heighten the tension and horror.

  • Atmospheric Environments: Explore a photo-realistic suburban setting that becomes increasingly unsettling as the horrific mysteries unravel.

  • Gripping Storyline: Dive into a compelling narrative filled with twists, dark secrets, haunting revelations and most important: horror you will remember.

  • Dynamic Choices: Your decisions and actions directly impact the story and Jason's fate.

  • Intense Survival Gameplay: Evade the sinister entities, solve intricate puzzles and manage your fear to survive.

  • Spine-Chilling HQ Audio Design: Immersive soundscapes and eerie audio cues heighten the tension and horror.

Prepare yourself for a nightmarish journey through Devil’s Drive, where every decision counts and where every shadow and door could hide a new terror. Will you survive the night and uncover the dark secrets of your own street, let alone your own home?

Join our community to share your experiences and theories
